price: ភាពនឿយហត់នឹងមិនប៉ះពាល់ដល់ពួកគេនៅក្នុងវា (ឋានសួគ៌)ឡើយ ហើយពួកគេក៏មិនត្រូវគេបណេ្ដញចេញពីទីនោះ វិញដែរ។
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
